paragraph__1.content: The transparent header will be applied to homepage slideshow section as well as collection pages with images.

localization_show_language_selector.label: Show language selector
localization_show_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [languages settings](/admin/settings/languages)

localization_show_currency_selector.label: Show currency selector
localization_show_currency_selector.info: To add a currency, go to your [currency settings](/admin/settings/payments). If your store is not using Shopify Payments, you can also enable the Custom currencies in Theme settings > Add-ons.

general_show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
general_show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

general_show_more_payment_options.label: Show more payment options button
general_show_more_payment_options.info: Dynamic checkout button must be enabled

developer_z_index_drawer.label: Overlays z-index
developer_z_index_drawer.info: Increase that number if you have 3rd-party App's element showing over your cart drawer.

cart_message_enable.label: Enable cart notification
cart_message_enable.info: Enabling this option will prevent the cart from opening

google_tag_manager.label: Google Tag Manager ID
google_tag_manager.info: Adding Google Tag Manager to your site may affect page speed. [Learn more](https://blog.dareboost.com/en/2018/04/how-tag-managers-impact-web-performance)

review_show_in_product_grid.label: Show in product grid
review_show_in_product_grid.info: These badges might also need to be enabled from within your Review app settings.

share_messenger.label: Share on Messenger
share_messenger.info: Messenger will only shows on mobile. Make sure to add your Facebook page ID below.

paragraph__1.content: The [Starter plan](https://theme.debutify.com/plans/starter)can activate up to 5 add-ons. The [Pro plan](https://theme.debutify.com/plans/pro)can activate up to 30 add-ons. The [Enterprise plan](https://theme.debutify.com/plans/enterprise)can activate all current and future add-ons.

paragraph__2.content: Boost your revenue by using these add-ons to increase and maximize your customers' cart value.

enable_cart_goal.label: Cart Goal
enable_cart_goal.info: Offer free shipping when a specific cart total amount is reached. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054070-how-to-use-the-cart-goal-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_savings.label: Cart Savings
enable_cart_savings.info: Display the total amount of savings in the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5161111-how-to-enable-the-cart-savings-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_reminder.label: Cart Reminder
enable_cart_reminder.info: Display a small cart banner on the bottom when there's a product in the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5883016-how-to-use-the-cart-reminder-add-on-in-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_upsell.label: Cart Upsell
enable_cart_upsell.info: Add up-sells and cross-sells directly in your cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057083-how-to-enable-the-cart-upsell-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_gift_wrap.label: Gift Wrap
enable_gift_wrap.info: Allows customers to mark an order as a gift and add a unique gift message. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5596124-how-to-enable-the-gift-wrap-add-on-in-the-debutify-shopify-theme)

enable_minimum_order.label: Minimum Order
enable_minimum_order.info: Allows store owners to set a minimum order amount before customers are allowed to checkout. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5768736-how-to-use-the-minimum-order-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_quantity_breaks.label: Quantity Breaks
enable_quantity_breaks.info: Reward customers with discount codes when they purchase multiple items from your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054197-how-to-enable-the-quantity-breaks-add-on-in-the-debutify-shopify-theme)

enable_upsell_bundles.label: Upsell Bundles
enable_upsell_bundles.info: Let customers buy different products in one-click by creating bundle offers. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054282-how-to-enable-the-upsell-bundles-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_upsell_popup.label: Upsell Pop-Up
enable_upsell_popup.info: Display a customizable upsell pop-up that trigger when adding a product to cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054298-how-to-enable-the-upsell-pop-up-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__3.content: Use our Smart Conversion Technology to increase conversion rate, accelerate sales and convert your visitors into buyers.

enable_addtocart_animation.label: Add-To-Cart Animation
enable_addtocart_animation.info: Add an animation to the product page add-to-cart button. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054044-how-to-enable-the-add-to-cart-animation-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_discount.label: Cart Discount
enable_cart_discount.info: Allow customers to enter discount codes in the cart before checkout. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054067-how-to-display-the-cart-discount-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cart_favicon.label: Cart Favicon
enable_cart_favicon.info: Change the page favicon to a secondary image if there is a product in cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5248732-how-to-enable-the-cart-favicon-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_customizable_products.label: Customizable Products
enable_customizable_products.info: Add several options and fields to customize your products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5462411-how-to-use-the-customizable-products-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_delivery_date.label: Delivery Date
enable_delivery_date.info: Allow visitors to select their preferred delivery date in the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5774446-how-to-enable-the-delivery-date-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_delivery_time.label: Delivery Time
enable_delivery_time.info: Display an approximate date of delivery. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054100-how-to-enable-the-delivery-time-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_discount_saved.label: Discount Saved
enable_discount_saved.info: Display the discount amount of on-sale product variants on the product page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054103-how-to-enable-the-discount-saved-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_inactive_tab_message.label: Inactive Tab Message
enable_inactive_tab_message.info: Display a different page title when the user goes to another tab. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242828-how-to-enable-the-inactive-tab-message-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_inventory_quantity.label: Inventory Quantity
enable_inventory_quantity.info: Display the stock level for each product variants. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054133-how-to-display-the-stock-levels-of-each-product-variant-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_bullet_points.label: Product Bullet Points
enable_product_bullet_points.info: Add short, easily digestible pieces of information about your products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227389-how-to-show-product-bullet-points-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_sales_countdown.label: Sales Countdown
enable_sales_countdown.info: Add a countdown timer for your on-sale products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054213-how-to-enable-the-sales-countdown-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_skip_cart.label: Skip Cart
enable_skip_cart.info: Send customers directly to the checkout page when the add to cart button is clicked. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5290632-how-to-enable-the-skip-cart-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_sticky_addtocart.label: Sticky Add-To-Cart
enable_sticky_addtocart.info: Add a sticky add-to-cart bar when scrolling past the add-to-cart button. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054241-how-to-enable-the-sticky-add-to-cart-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_trust_badge.label: Trust Badge
enable_trust_badge.info: Display payments icons or custom trust badge under the add-to-cart and checkout buttons. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054277-how-to-enable-the-trust-badge-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__4.content: Turn your customers into loyal buyers. Introduce new products, send promotions, and offer irresistible deals to make your customers buy more and buy often.

enable_back_in_stock.label: Back In Stock
enable_back_in_stock.info: Allow customers to fill back in stock request form. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5265388-how-to-enable-the-back-in-stock-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_instagram_feed.label: Instagram Feed
enable_instagram_feed.info: Display the latest images of your Instagram page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057122-how-to-use-the-instagram-feed-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_newsletter_popup.label: Newsletter Pop-Up
enable_newsletter_popup.info: Display a customizable newsletter pop-up to capture your visitor's email before they leave your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054175-how-to-display-a-newsletter-pop-up-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_order_feedback.label: Order Feedback
enable_order_feedback.info: Find out how your customers know about you. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242840-how-to-enable-the-order-feedback-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_social_discount.label: Social Discount
enable_social_discount.info: Reward customer with a discount code when they share your products on social media. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057551-how-to-enable-the-social-discount-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_wish_list.label: Wish List
enable_wish_list.info: Let customers add their favorite products to a wish list they can come back to later. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054299-how-to-enable-the-wish-list-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__5.content: Harness the full power of Debutify's Persuasive Design Technology.  Let your customers experience a seamless shopping experience.

enable_automatic_geolocation.label: Automatic Geolocation
enable_automatic_geolocation.info: Add ability to set default language and currency based on user location. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057013-how-to-use-the-automatic-geolocation-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_collection_addtocart.label: Collection Add-To-Cart
enable_collection_addtocart.info: Allow visitors to add products to cart directly from collection pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054085-how-to-enable-the-collection-add-to-cart-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_collection_filters.label: Collection Filters
enable_collection_filters.info: Allow visitors to filter the products on the collection page by the parameters they want. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5290641-how-to-enable-the-collection-filters-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_color_swatches.label: Color Swatches
enable_color_swatches.info: Add color swatches to your product options. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054086-how-to-add-color-swatches-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_custom_currencies.label: Custom Currencies
enable_custom_currencies.info: Show prices in multiple currencies without having to use Shopify Payment multi-currency converter. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057090-how-to-use-the-custom-currencies-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_facebook_messenger.label: Facebook Messenger
enable_facebook_messenger.info: Add a Facebook Messenger chat widget to your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057679-how-to-add-a-facebook-messenger-chat-widget-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_faq_page.label: FAQ
enable_faq_page.info: Add a searchable question and answers module to your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054110-how-to-use-the-faqs-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_infinite_scroll.label: Infinite Scroll
enable_infinite_scroll.info: Replace paginations with a "Load more" button or by automatically loading items as you scroll down the page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5161154-how-to-enable-the-infinite-scroll-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_mega_menu.label: Mega Menu
enable_mega_menu.info: Add nested menus, products, collections, articles and more to your header navigation. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054172-how-to-create-a-mega-menu-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_menu_bar.label: Menu Bar
enable_menu_bar.info: Add a simple scrollable menu below header. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5231134-how-to-enable-the-menu-bar-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_order_tracking.label: Order Tracking
enable_order_tracking.info: Let your customer track their orders directly from within your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057483-how-to-enable-the-order-tracking-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_page_speed_booster.label: Page Speed Booster
enable_page_speed_booster.info: Improve your conversion rate by making your store faster. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227401-how-to-enable-the-page-speed-booster-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_page_transition.label: Page Transition
enable_page_transition.info: Display a preloader with your logo while the page is loading. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057511-how-to-enable-the-page-transition-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_pricing_table.label: Pricing Table
enable_pricing_table.info: Showcase product options, bundles, packages and all other upgrade options in a side-by-side price comparison table. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054183-how-to-enable-the-pricing-table-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_image_crop.label: Product Image Crop
enable_product_image_crop.info: Format all your product images into the same ratio. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057531-how-to-use-the-product-image-crop-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_swatches.label: Product Swatches
enable_product_swatches.info: Allows you to split variants into unique products and group them together as product swatches. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5472573-how-to-enable-the-product-swatches-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_product_tabs.label: Product Tabs
enable_product_tabs.info: Add additional details about your products in customizable tabs. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054187-how-to-create-product-tabs-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_quick_compare.label: Quick Compare
enable_quick_compare.info: Let your customers easily compare the features of different products and choose which one is best for them. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5792928-how-to-use-the-quick-compare-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_quick_view.label: Quick View
enable_quick_view.info: Let customers quickly view your product details before they visit the product page. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054198-how-to-enable-the-quick-view-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_recently_viewed.label: Recently Viewed
enable_recently_viewed.info: Display the products a visitor has seen while browsing your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057690-how-to-enable-the-recently-viewed-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_size_chart.label: Size Chart
enable_size_chart.info: Add customizable size guides with tables and images to your product pages. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057686-how-to-manage-the-size-chart-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_smart_search.label: Smart Search
enable_smart_search.info: Show search results immediately as you type into the search field. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054239-how-to-use-the-smart-search-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_synced_variant_image.label: Synced Variant Image
enable_synced_variant_image.info: Variant changes when changing slide in the product gallery. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5227327-how-to-enable-the-synced-variant-image-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__6.content: Make sure your store is compliant and protect your store from copycats and identity thieves using our Shop Protect Add-ons.

enable_age_check.label: Age Check
enable_age_check.info: Verifies the age of website visitors before they can access your content and products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5057047-how-to-use-the-age-check-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_agree_to_terms.label: Agree To Terms
enable_agree_to_terms.info: Ask customers to agree with your Terms & conditions before checking out. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5242844-how-to-enable-the-agree-to-terms-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_cookie_box.label: Cookie Box
enable_cookie_box.info: Display a cookie box to make your website GDPR compliant. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054095-how-to-use-the-cookie-box-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

enable_shop_protect.label: Shop Protect
enable_shop_protect.info: Protect your product description, images, articles and other content from being stolen. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054230-how-to-use-the-shop-protect-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

paragraph__2.content: To enable/disable this add-on, go to Theme settings > Debutify Add-ons.

color_options_list_page.label: Product page variant options
color_options_list_page.info: Add variant options name with comma-separated

color_options_list_grid.label: Product grid variant options
color_options_list_grid.info: Color swatches will be applied to all variant options with this name

paragraph__3.content: While enabled, the native Shopify Payment multi-currency converter will be disabled. Note that Shopify doesn't allow us to convert the prices on the Checkout page.

supported_currencies.label: Supported currencies
supported_currencies.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](https://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

paragraph__2.content: To enable/disable this add-on, go to Theme settings > Debutify Add-ons.

language_paragraph__2.content: To edit languages, go to Themes > Actions > Edit languages > Add-Ons.

exclude_days.label: Delivery exclude days
exclude_days.info: Use the 'MON','TUE','WED','THU','FRI','SAT' and 'SUN'. Separate exclude days with commas

paragraph__2.content: To enable/disable this add-on, go to Theme settings > Debutify Add-ons.

language_paragraph__2.content: To edit languages, go to Themes > Actions > Edit languages > Add-Ons.

code.label: Code
code.info: How to get code? Go to your Facebook page > Settings > Messaging > Add Messenger to your website > Copy & paste the code snippet

loading_image.info: Leave empty to display the default loading icon

language_paragraph__2.content: To edit languages, go to Themes > Actions > Edit languages > Add-Ons.

header__4.info: If random quantities setting is disabled

quantity_threshold.label: Threshold quantity
quantity_threshold.info: If product quantity is higher than the threshold set, then hide product inventory quantity or show a general text

paragraph__3.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

popup_time_based_trigger_timeout.label: Time
popup_time_based_trigger_timeout.info: Popup will show after X seconds

popup_scroll_depth_percentage.label: Scroll depth
popup_scroll_depth_percentage.info: Popup will show when customer is scrolling page by X percentages

customer_tag.label: Tag
customer_tag.info: Tag will be added to this customer and can be used to trigger email automation.

paragraph__4.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

header__1.info: Add more than one message to enable the carousel

paragraph__2.content: To enable/disable this add-on, go to Theme settings > Debutify Add-ons.

tags.label: Tags
tags.info: Tags separated by commas. e.g. sneakers,men

categories.label: Collections list
categories.info: Collection names, separated by commas. e.g. sneakers,men

paragraph__2.content: To enable/disable this add-on, go to Theme settings > Debutify Add-ons.

header__1.info: Because the size and shape of the slideshow depends on the size and shape of the customer's device, your slideshow images will be cropped on some screens. Try to use images that have a focal point in the middle so that the important part of each image is always visible.

slide_link.label: Slide link
slide_link.info: Adding a slide link will disable the buttons

video.label: Background video
video.info: To upload your video, click on Theme actions > Edit code > Assets > Add a new asset. Write your file name with format which is uploaded in Assets folder. For e.g. videoplayback.mp4

enable_custom_fonts.label: Enable custom fonts
enable_custom_fonts.info: Selecting a custom font will impact your page load speed

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Sorting only applies when 'All' is selected

collection_per_page.label: Collection per page
collection_per_page.info: This settings only work, when select collections to show 'All' option

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: You’ll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map

background_image.label: Image
background_image.info: Displayed if the map isn’t loaded

newsletter_form_heading.label: Newsletter form heading
newsletter_form_heading.info: [Tell your visitors about a launch day discount](https://www.shopify.com/blog/15514000-14-ways-to-use-offers-coupons-discounts-and-deals-to-drive-revenue-and-customer-loyalty).

show_product_recommendations.label: Show dynamic recommendations
show_product_recommendations.info: Dynamic recommendations change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

paragraph__1.content: This feature allows you to show a brief description under the product price. Add the shortcode [split_description] in the HTML section of your product description to split it.
